DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim examine effect high protein intake ( soy whey protein ) weightmaintenance weight loss group predispose ( severe ) obese person . Furthermore , examine short-term long-term effect high protein intake appetite regulation diet induce thermogenese ( DIT ) . Finally examine effect calcium weightmaintence , bloodlipid profilen , appetite regulation DIT . The study parallel RCT weight loss ( WL ) period ( 8 week low calorie diet ) weightmaintence ( WM ) period ( 24 week daily intake supplement ) . 200 overweight/obese subject enrol study randomize placebo ( maltodextrin ) , soy protein , whey protein calcium enrich whey protein supplement . At baseline ( week 0 ) , WL period ( week 8 ) WM period ( week 24 ) body weight composition measure blood sample collect . Meal test perform week 0 24 ( examine appetite regulation DIT ) . Urine feces collect three time study . Subjects receive dietary counseling ( group ) regularly study body weight measured visit .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Protein Calcium Weight Change Blood Lipid Profile
